title: Add guided first-run experience
body: Introduce a short, guided first-run flow that explains what the player is looking at and what to do first.

title: Add contextual inline hints
body: Display contextual hints near controls explaining what they affect and when to use them.

title: Add progressive disclosure of controls
body: Hide advanced controls by default and progressively reveal them as the player learns.

title: Add clear primary call-to-action
body: Make it obvious what the player should do next at all times.

title: Add example prompts library
body: Provide a small set of example prompts that demonstrate different LLM behaviors.

title: Add interactive tutorial scenario
body: Create a hands-on tutorial scenario that teaches by doing, not reading.

title: Add visual explanation of tokenization
body: Visually explain what tokens are and how input text becomes tokens.

title: Add attention visualization explanation
body: Explain what the attention visualization represents in simple language.

title: Add context window explanation
body: Explain what the context window is and how it affects generation.

title: Add sampling controls explanation
body: Explain temperature and randomness using plain language and examples.

title: Add failure explanation overlay
body: When output is bad or unexpected, explain why in simple terms.

title: Add \"Why did this happen?\" breakdown
body: Provide a collapsible breakdown explaining the cause of the last output.

title: Add glossary of key concepts
body: Create a lightweight glossary for LLM terms used in the UI.

title: Add hover-based micro-explanations
body: Show short explanations on hover for technical terms.

title: Add clear reset and undo actions
body: Allow users to safely reset or undo experiments without fear.

title: Add visual progression indicators
body: Show players how their understanding is progressing, not just game progress.

title: Add plain-language labels for controls
body: Replace technical labels with friendly explanations where possible.

title: Add onboarding checklist
body: Give players a short checklist of things to try to learn core concepts.

title: Add end-of-scenario learning summary
body: Summarize what the player learned after completing a scenario.

title: Add accessibility and readability pass
body: Improve contrast, spacing, font size, and readability for long sessions.
